name: Spring Shorts
shortDescription: New for spring, these shorts keep things cool and collected. Wear with the Dylan jacket for a modern suiting look. Made in our cotton stretch fabric with a micro houndstooth pattern.

  • elongated pockets
  • exposed button closure
  • new content
  • dry clean only
